verses.roman:
prati-vṛkṣa-tale prabhu karena nartana
vāsudeva-datta mātra karena gāyana

synonyms: prati-vṛkṣa-tale—underneath each tree; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena nartana—dances; vāsudeva-datta—Vāsudeva Datta; mātra—only; karena—performs; gāyana—chanting.
translation: As Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu danced beneath each and every tree, Vāsudeva Datta sang alone.
